column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Went there on a Sunday for dinner and couldn't be more pleased! Everyone we interacted with
column3: was amazing. The ambiance and crowd is awesome too. We ordered the shrimp
column7: I couldn't find something to critique if I tried. Also ordered a Â 1/2 pitcher of peach sangria which I highly recommend. Our waiter so elegantly talked us into dessert
column8: so we ordered the butterscotch and truffle
column9: which was TERRIFIC. This is such a fun place to go either on a date or with family. Will be going back!
